roleset.name: to annoy, bother
roleset.note: VEX-V NOTES: Member of Vncls amuse-31.1. (from vex.01-v)

example.name: passive
example.text: [The state agency]-1 was particularly vexed [*-1]to learn that the Rubens and a half-dozen other paintings listed [*] among the bank 's `` furniture and fixtures , '' were actually hanging in the chairman 's house .
example.arg: [*-1] to learn that the Rubens and a half-dozen other paintings listed [*]among the bank 's `` furniture and fixtures , '' were actually hanging in the chairman 's house
